title: May on the Mongols Secondary MCQ 1

content.prompt: The expansion of the Mongol Empire most directly led to which of the following political developments in Afro-Eurasia?

choices.label: The spread of feudalism to western Europe, as the Mongol conquests greatly weakened centralized monarchies
The expansion of the Mali Empire in West Africa, as the Mongol conquests destroyed the Abbasid Caliphate
The collapse of previously existing states, such as the Song dynasty of China
The adoption of Islamic systems of rule by Turkic states in the Middle East, such as the Seljuq Empire

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
